hint.text: \(No. \, of \, votes = \frac{sector \,angle}{360} \times Total\, number\, of\, people\)

solution.text:
Central angle for football \(=90\) degrees
Central angle for tennis \(=72\) degrees
Total number of votes \(=_{{j*5000}}_\)
Therefore,
No. of votes for football \(=\frac {90}{360} \times _{{j*5000}}_\)
\(=_{{j*1250}}_\)
No. of votes for tennis \(=\frac {72}{360} \times _{{j*5000}}_\)
\(=_{{j*1000}}_\)
Therefore, football received \(_{{j*1250}}_-_{{j*1000}}_=_{{j*250}}_\) more votes than kabaddi.

content.text:
How many more votes did football get as compared to tennis?
Total number of votes \(=_{{j*5000}}_\)
